defs: = ನಂಬುಗೆದೋರು.
the god.
the thin, horny substance growing out at the ends of the fingers and toes of people, monkeys, etc. a nail.
a similar growth on the toes of a bird or animal; claw.
the act or an instance of cheating.
a union of men in the same craft, esp. trade, formed to protect the interest of its members.
a large kettle-drum.
= ನಕಲು1.
= ನಕಲು2.
a man who is playful in speech and actions, esp. for entertaining others; a jester; joker; a fool.
ನಕಲಿ ಶ್ಯಾಮ nakali śyāma = ನಕಲಿ2 - 4.
that is not original, but made just like another; a copy.
an imitation of something, as a model (as the life for an artwork, drama, etc.).
that which is made in imitation of something genuine so as to deceive or defraud; a counterfeit.
a gay, light-hearted action or mood; fun; joking; jest.
ನಕಲು ತೆಗೆ nakalu tege to make a copy of; ನಕಲು ಮಾಡು nakalu māḍu to make a copy of (an artwork, written matter, picture, etc.); 2. to imitate or copy another's mannerisms, outward behaviour, etc.
the letter or the sound of 'ನ '.
an utterance expressing refusal; an expression meaning 'no'.
containing, expressing or implying a refusal; that says 'no'.
to refuse; to say 'no'.
= ನಕ್ಷೆ.
= ನಕಾಶೆತೆಗೆ.
= ನಕ್ಷೆ.
to draw the outline of a piece of land, village, town, state, etc.
= ನಕ್ಷೆ.
= ನಕಾಸೆಕೆಲಸ.
= ನಕ್ಷೆ.
a carving on metal, wood, stone, etc.
a carved figure or design.
a man who praises another too much, untruly or insincerely.
the civet-like, carnivore Viverra ichneumon of Viverridae family, noted for its ability to kill poisonous snakes; a mongoose.
the fourth of the five Pāṇḍavas.
a particular kind of vīṇe, a stringed musical instrument.
a species of fish.
a plant supposed to furnish ichneumons with an antidote when bitten by a snake.
= ನಕುಲ1.
to undergo great suffering; to grieve; to feel deep distress.
= ನಕ್ಕಬಡಿ.
the plant Ximenia americana of Olacaceae family.
= ನಕ್ಕರಿ.
a sub-caste among vokkaligas, the agricultural community.
a tinge or a tint that renders a gem defective.
a glittering piece stitched to a clothe, fastened to a garland, etc. for decorative purpose.
a powder of glittering substance used in decoration.
a positive assurance; guarantee.
a ring of wire with a nail-like projection worn on the fingers for plucking the strings of musical instruments; a plectrum.
an ornamental work made on garlands, clothes, etc. using nakki (a glittering piece).
to cause to lick with the tongue.
to make a low, clucking sound (ḷṭṭrr… or lccch….etc.) by smacking the tongue against the palate, esp. while driving cattle.
to pass the tongue smoothly over; to lick.
(fig.) to touch.
to consume; to eat up; to devour.
any of a number of oligochaetous worms that burrow in the soil, esp. any of a genus (Lumbricus) very important in aerating and fertilizing the soil; an earthworm.
= ನಕ್ಕೆಚಿಕ್ಕನಾಕು.
the plant Hemionites arifolia (= H. cordifolia) of Polypodiaceae family.
the period of darkness between sunset and sunrise; night.
a religious observance of having food only during nights (and not during day time).
he who moves, wanders or is active during night only as a burglar, owl, cat, evil spirit, daemon, etc.
Naiřti,, the guardian or regent of the south-western quarter.
she who moves, wanders or is active during night only; a female evil spirit or daemon.
old, torn clothes; rags.
the moon.
he who moves, wanders or is active during night only; an evil spirit or daemon.
a religious observance of having food only during nights (and not during day time).
the evergreen tree Pongamia pinnata (= P. glabra) of Papilionaceae family; Indian beach.
= ನಕ್ತಭೋಜನ.
to make dark; to cause night to happen.
= (but rightly ನಕ್ತೈಕಭುಕ್ತ) ನಕ್ತಭೋಜನ; .
= ನಕ್ತಭೋಜನ.

any of a subfamily (Crocodylinae) of large, flesh-eating, lizard-like crocodilian reptiles living in or around tropical streams and having thick, horny skin composed of scales and plates, a long tail, and a long, narrow, triangular head with massive jaws.
(fig.) a pretentious sleep with an evil plot in mind.
any of the heavenly bodies, except the moon, appearing as fixed luminous points in the sky at night; a star.
(astrol.) any of the supposed twenty seven stars a) that was ruling the moment of one's birth, believed to determine the destiny through out his or her life or b) that brings rain.
(arith.) a symbol for the number twenty-seven.
(Jain.) a class of gods.
a conventionalized flat figure having (usu. five or six) symmetrical projecting points, regarded as a representation of a star of the sky; a star.
any mark, shape, emblem or the like resembling such a figure, often used as an award, symbol of rank or authority, etc.; a star.
a star-like sign (*) used in printing to indicate footnote references, omissions, etc.; an asterisk.
= ನಕ್ಷತ್ರಕ.
(fig.) a man who annoys constantly or repeatedly for something; a pesterer; a bother.
= ನಕ್ಷತ್ರಪುಂಜ.
= ನಕ್ಷತ್ರಪುಂಜ.
a man who is supposed to foretell the future by studying the stars; an astrologer.
a quarter of a period during which any of the twenty seven astrological star rules the destiny of human beings.
a group or cluster of stars that may or may not form a constellation; an asterism.
a kind of fire-cracker, that goes up like a rocket, when lit; a sky-rocket.
= ನಕ್ಷತ್ರಪುಂಜ.
a system of reckoned or measured by the apparent movement of stars.
= ನಕ್ಷತ್ರಪುಂಜ.
a necklace of twenty seven pearls.
(pros.) a kind of poetical composition having twenty seven stanzas.
= ನಕ್ಷತ್ರಮಾಲಿಕೆ.
any of a subclass (Asteroidea) of echinoderms with a hard, spiny skeleton and five or more arms or rays arranged like the points of a star; an asteroid; a star-fish.
= ನಕ್ಷತ್ರಪುಂಜ.
the starry region; the firmament.
a man who watches the stars.
a woman who watches the stars.
the vast space around earth, in which stars are located and move (or apparently move).
a group of stars which can be configured into a particular, but arbitrary form; a constellation.
= ನಕ್ಷತ್ರಕ.
= ನಕ್ಷತ್ರಕ.
a kind of religious sacrifice.
the actual or refracted appearance of a star above the horizon.
a man who makes his living on astrology; an astrologer.
he whose nose is short.
a drawing or other representation, usu. on a flat surface, of all or part of the earth's surface ordinarily showing countries, bodies of water, cities, mountains, etc.; a map.
a similar representation of part of the sky, showing the relative position of the stars, planets, etc.; a map.
any map-like representation or delineation.
a drawing or diagram showing the arrangement in horizontal section of a structure, as a building proposed to be built; an architectural plan.
a photographic reproduction in white on a blue background, as of architectural or engineering plans.
a sketch, drawing or plan that explains a thing by outlining its parts and their relationships, workings, etc.; a diagram.
a carved figure; a carving.
a thin, horny plate, consisting of modified epidermis, growing on the upper side of the end of a finger or toe; a nail.
a sharp, usu. curved, nail on the foot of an animal, as on a cat, dog or bird; a claw.
the horny covering protecting the ends of the digits or encasing the foot in certain animals, as the ox and horse; a hoof.
a kind of perfume.
a kind of plant (Unguis odoratus ?).
(arith.) a symbol for the number twenty.

ನಖ ಬಣ್ಣವ ಕಾಣು nakha baṇṇava kāṇu (a girl) to have menstrual period; to undergo menstruation; ನಖಮಾಂಸ ಪ್ರೀತಿ nakha māmsa prīti a very close, intimate association; ನಖಮಾಂಸ ಸ್ಥಿತಿ nakha māmsa sthiti = ನಖಮಾಂಸ ಪ್ರೀತಿ.
barely or moderately warm; lukewarm.
that which is barely or moderately warm.
(erot.) a scratch or a mark made (on the body) by the nails of one's sexual partner.

a union of men in the same craft, esp. trade, formed to protect the interest of its members.
a small mechanical device for clipping the finger-nails or toe-nails; a nail-cutter; nail-clippers.
the act of trifling, dallying (of a girl or woman) to get men's attention or admiration.
any of the animals as lion, tiger, rooster, etc. which uses its claw as a weapon.
the shrub (or small tree) Helicteres isora of Sterculiaceae family, with red flowers and spirally turned fruits; East Indian screw pine.
that which has fallen into disrepair, broken down, etc. as by negligence for a long time; a dilapidated thing.
from tip to toe; completely.
a fighting with finger nails or claws.

a kind of perfume.
an accessory, article or detail used to beautify the appearance of something to which it is added or of which it is a part; an ornament; an embellishment.

that which does not move, as a mountain or tree.

a large number having twenty seven digits.
an elephant.

(pros.) a group consisting of three short syllabic instants (uuu); tribrach.
not fit to be considered or cared for; deserving to be ignored.
that which is not fit to be or need not be, considered or cared for; fit to be ignored; a person of no consequence or of mean status, rank, etc.

actual money as distinguished from checks or credit, one has at a point of time (or may be obtained quickly or easily within a short period); ready-money.

the earth.
